[comment]
早川先生提供のデータを処理するためにパラメータファイル

[file]
dir_dicom=U:\data\Simulation\ボランティア_澤田_30Y\DICOM_Data_MRA
key_dicom=*.*
modeUnsignedShort=0

[marching cube]
threshold=180

[process]
filename=param_oshima.txt

[preprocess]
threshold=170
voxel expanding=2.000000
region growing=1050
voxel gaussian=0
modeSmoothing6Neighbor=1
modeCubeResolution=1

[DICOM_visualization]
//min_value=-300
//max_value=1000
//min_value=1200
//max_value=1800
min_value=0
max_value=600
z_step=2

[region growing]
threshold radius=0.500000
threshold ct=1500
threshold ct max=1100
sphere radius=1
threshold ct-min=200
threshold ct-max=1000
color_index=3
modeRemoveHoleRegion=1
closingNumber=0
openingNumber=0
erosionNumber=0

[calcification]
threshold ct high=1000
threshold ct low=1000
[masking high ct value]
masking high ct value=800
[ct range]
low ct value=200
high ct value=500
[prunning length]
prunning length=10.000000
[spline fitting]
the number of control points=10
length step=5.000000
[test_data]
step z=20
radius x=50
radius y=50
